Name: maximize_project_priority
Description: Maximize the priority of the selected projects.

Name: maximize_total_story_points
Description: Maximize the sum of story points completed in a sprint.

Name: minimize_project_budget_usage
Description: Minimize the total budget spent on all projects.

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the effort for individual tasks to improve efficiency.

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average velocity of the development teams.

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the severity of unresolved blockers.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the achievement status of sprint goals.

Name: maximize_feature_priority_in_release
Description: Prioritize features with higher priority for the next release.

Name: maximize_worker_availability
Description: Maximize the overall availability of workers for task assignment.

Name: minimize_sprint_duration
Description: Minimize the time between sprint start and end dates.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence
Description: Focus on features relevant to stakeholders with high influence.

Name: maximize_skill_level_in_team
Description: Maximize the average skill level of workers within a team.
